title: i love it..
body:
This is a script which modifies .profile to add Windows/System32... then itll turn all .exe programs in system32 into aliases... such as ipconfig = ipconfig.exe... It has 0 error checking.. im sure someone could package it up nicely ;)
#!/bin/bash
#This will turn every executable inside of system32 into a bash alias so that it can be
#executed easily.. such as ipconfig, tasklist, taskkill, etc
#there is no error checking.. its pretty basic/simple
#modifies ~/.profile for long term installation
#remove bottom 2 lines to delete

comments.body: The ability to merge windows utilities into WSL is pretty awesome!
